text: 11.9: Mt 7.7; Mk 11.24; Zo 15.7; 1 Zo 3.22Gu guigira nde nzuai, nde bigɨn the suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suaŋv ana nzanga, ana mba bigɨnan nden nɨɨnga. Nde bigɨn the suaŋv ganɨnga, Fhe Bakɨme nden kurarga, nde mba bigɨna gangirga. Nde bigɨn the suaŋv Fhe Bakɨmen kamɨnga, Fhe Bakɨme nde mbarararga.
